div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of April 10, 1891. [FANNIE ZEISLER COMPLIMENTED]

body.p: Mme. Fannie Bloomfield Zeisler was paid a high compliment last week when she was asked to appear as soloist at the concert of Lenox Lyceum in New York, April 19, to be given as a grand farewell to Theodore Thomas. Mme. Zeisler was forced to decline, owing to her engagement with the Amateur Musical Club of this City, of April 20.
